string.text: To use the binoculars select them ($$ACTION_wpn_5$$) and press "fire" to zoom in.
To crouch low press ($$ACTION_crouch$$) + (Shift)
To crouch press ($$ACTION_crouch$$)
To hide your weapon simply select the bolt ($$ACTION_wpn_6$$).
To jump press ($$ACTION_jump$$)
Movement types.

You aren't a truck so you can't carry several tonnes of equipment. If the weight of your items begins to exceed your limits you will lose energy very quickly. You can monitor the weight of your items and the maximum amount you can carry in your inventory.

When the character is in an area with a high level of background radiation or wears a radioactive artifact on his belt he begins to exhibit signs of radiation poisoning and he begins to lose health. This effect can be counteracted by using anti-radiation meds and vodka.

When the player helps someone that person's attitude towards the player improves as does the player's general reputation. A better attitude and reputation will help you in talking to the person - you can get additional information from them or buy things for less. If you shoot at a stalker his attitude towards you will become negative as will that of his friends and they will attack you.

This is a special place for sleeping. You can get a good night's sleep, wait out the night or simply kill time here. To go to sleep open the inventory, set the amount of time you want to sleep for and press the "Rest" button. The character will wake up at the designated time. Sometimes he will have dreams.

Sometimes you will need to run faster. To do this press ($$ACTION_sprint_toggle$$) while running. While sprinting the character runs faster and jumps further but tires more quickly and is unable to shoot.

If the character does not eat for a while he becomes hungry. Should the character become very hungry he will begin to slowly lose health. To prevent this from happening the character must eat. A loaf of bread, some tinned food or a piece of sausage will solve this problem easily enough.

When the character runs for a prolonged period of time he gets tired. When he becomes very tired he will be unable to run and will move at walking pace. The more the character is carrying the faster he gets tired. Standing still for a few seconds allows the character to recover his energy.

All weapons have a durability parameter. The lower a weapon's durability the more often it will jam. To clear the jam reload the weapon by pressing $$ACTION_wpn_reload$$. The durability of weapons decreases with use and a weapon may become completely useless if struck by bullets.

When the character is hit the wound may bleed. Bleeding causes the character to constantly lose health. The more serious the bleeding (a green icon means slight bleeding while a red icon indicates a serious haemorrhage) the faster the rate at which the character loses health. Bleeding will stop with time but even serious haemorrhages can be stopped immediately by using bandages.

Marked One!? Alive!? That's perfect! You've managed to disable the scorcher, all our guys are trying to break through to the center of the Zone through Prypyat. What is there is unknown: maybe the klondike of arifacts and maybe the wish fulfiller. At this moment a squad of veterans is assembling to go deep inside the Zone near Prypyat, you can join them, I'll warn them about you.

To all appearances the fighters in the former Agroprom Institute building have found something. I'm sure it is somehow related to the center of the Zone. So, that something the militaries dug out is guarded on the second floor of the Institute building. It seems that it's all about a small white case. Snatching it right from under SBU task force nose won't be an easy task at all. They are tough fighters. Be extremely watchful!
You have to get to the scientists and find out the location of lab X-16 to obtain the missing portion of documents.
Marked One, get cracking - militaries won't let you escape easily. I've told Barkeep about you - he should settle on with Duty to let you in.
To skip press ($$ACTION_USE$$).
